title: Can't get into game
body: I started up a normals and I couldn't actually get into game, no loading screen or anything. I restarted my LoL and went to reconnect yet it did nothing. Any ideas?

replies.body:
Hey there,

That sounds odd, did the game actually launch and were you presented with a connection error message? Or did the game not launch at all?

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me.
